item.title: Washington state abandons all tourism marketing (AP)
item.description: AP - Washington state is shuttering the official tourism agency that unifies its marketing message and abandoning all public support for one of its largest industries.

item.title: TSA re-inspects elderly woman over wet diaper (AP)
item.description: AP - The family of a gravely ill 95-year-old woman says federal inspectors wouldn't let her mother board a plane because her adult diaper was wet, setting off alarms.
